name: City of Games Baccarat & Slots
description:
Enjoy the thrill of winning authentic baccarat and slots games from Macau, Vegas and more! Play for free and win big! Earn real-world rewards from our world-class partners for VIP nightclub access, shows, dinners, spa treatments and even 5-star accommodations.

What are you waiting for? Download the City of Games app on your iOS devices today!

Join now and connect to Facebook to receive even more Free Chips and Reward Points!

Download the City of Games app to enjoy:
-- Real Rewards from resorts, entertainment venues, and restaurants!
-- Huge Progressive Jackpot for win streaks
-- Brand new SLOTS 777 games
-- New slots machines will be introduced on a regular basis
-- Authentic Baccarat (both Classic and No-Commission)
-- Real 3D Card Squeezing
-- Daily Goals earn free chips and reward points
-- Spin the Jackpot Wheel for even more free chips
-- Play in Cantonese, Mandarin, Vietnamese, Bahasa Indonesia, Thai and English. More languages on the way!
Note:
-- City of Games is intended for adult audiences.
-- City of Games does not offer “real money gambling

If you ever need help or have comments, please contact us at: info@cityofgamesapp.com

AND... if you like us, give City of Games a 5-star review!!!
